rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I hope Meleph-sama remains stationed
at Torigo Relay Station for some
time...

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0002
rows.name:
There's a sense of calm while she's
here.

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Because we know that whatever
happens, she'll protect the peace
in Gula.

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Wouldn't be exaggerating to say she's
everyone's rock and shield...

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0006
rows.name:
I do hope you'll remain here at
Torigo Relay Station for a while,
Meleph-sama.

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0007
rows.name:
There's always a sense of calm while
you're here.

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0008
rows.name:
Because we know that whatever
happens, you'll protect the peace
in Gula.

rows.label: tlk45320124_01_msg0009
rows.name:
It wouldn't be exaggerating to say
you're our rock and shield, ma'am...
